column4: Could I unzip a file from a Ubuntu server on windows using Filezilla ?
do you want to zip it?
I use 7zip on Windows and Ubuntu as it pretty much can uncompress anything
Thing is this ain't my server and I don't have SSH just FTP and trying to unzip my site but net2ftp said it was too big to unzip so im thinking thats in php.ini is there another way i can trasnfer
so you have a tar.bz that you want to unzip?
nah but its reg zip but I can make it tar.bz
it doesn't matter, where is this zip file (remote or local to your machine
on windows I use winscp to download, and 7zip to uncompress
I'm trying to uncompress it onto the server though
and you do not have shell access?
so that is kind of your problem right there
I'm coincidently migrating to new host
I didn't think that ftp supports that sort of transaction, I could be wrong as I have not used ftp in close to a decade.  The webhost I use allows ssh and sftp/scp
Yeah too young to pay gonna use 000webhost till I can get a paid one
